summary: TypeScript SDK v1.10.0 build fails with GLIBC_2.29 version error on Linux systems with older glibc versions (e.g., glibc 2.28). The core-bridge native module compiled for a newer glibc is incompatible with deployment environments using older glibc versions.
userImpact: Users upgrading to v1.10.0 experience build failures in deployment environments with glibc 2.28, preventing successful deployments on platforms like Render.
rootCause: The v1.10.0 core-bridge native module was compiled against glibc 2.29, but many deployment environments use glibc 2.28, causing dynamic loader failures when requiring the native .node module.
proposedFix: Rebuild the core-bridge native module to be compatible with glibc 2.28 instead of requiring glibc 2.29, as implemented in PR #1428.
workaround: Downgrade to v1.9.0 or earlier until the fix is released.
resolutionDetails: Fixed in v1.10.1 by rebuilding core-bridge to support glibc 2.28 via PR #1428.
